Question
========

Six earth science students in their third year earned, respectively 60, 54, 12, 18, 9 and 12 ecs, respectively. Compared to their average number of ecs, their median number of ecs is

Answerlist
----------

* The same.
* Higher.
* Lower.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Same..: Incorrect
* Higher..: Incorrect
* Lower...: Correct
